```{r}

library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.providers)


lat = -37.730202
lon = 145.042387

basemap <- leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron", group = 'Default') |>
  addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery", group = 'Esri Imagery') |>
  setView(lng = lon, lat = lat, zoom = 14) 


```
